subject: Public Speaking
title: The Power of Hope
description: A fast breakdown of The Power of Hope for builders.

hook.text: Hope is the most motivating emotion a speaker can create.

buildup.text: Hope combines desire for change with belief it's possible.

discovery.text: Audiences who feel hopeful take action. Hopeless audiences don't.

twist.text: Great speeches create hope even in terrible circumstances.

climax.text: Hope is what separates motivating speeches from depressing ones.

punchline.text: Create hope. It's the ultimate motivator.

quiz.question: Why is hope so powerful?
options: It combines desire with belief in possibility
